card.name: Aerial Caravan
card.text: Flying {1}{U}{U}: Exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Arrest
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Battle Rampart

card.name: Battle Squadron
card.text: Flying Battle Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Bifurcate
card.text: Search your library for a permanent card with the same name as target nontoken creature and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Black Market
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on Black Market. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} to your mana pool for each charge counter on Black Market.

card.name: Blaster Mage

card.name: Blockade Runner
card.text: {U}: Blockade Runner can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Blood Hound
card.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on Blood Hound. At the beginning of your end step, remove all +1/+1 counters from Blood Hound.

card.name: Blood Oath

card.text: Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy all creatures with power 2 or less. If you lose the flip, destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater.

card.name: Putrefaction
card.text: Whenever a player casts a green or white spell, that player discards a card.

card.name: Quagmire Lamprey
card.text: Whenever Quagmire Lamprey becomes blocked by a creature, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Rain of Tears
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Ramosian Captain
card.text: First strike {5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ramosian Commander
card.text: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 5 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ramosian Lieutenant
card.text: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ramosian Rally
card.text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Ramosian Rally's mana cost. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ramosian Sergeant
card.text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ramosian Sky Marshal
card.text: Flying {7}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 6 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rampart Crawler
card.text: Rampart Crawler can't be blocked by Walls.

card.name: Rappelling Scouts
card.text: Flying {2}{W}: Rappelling Scouts gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Remote Farm
card.text: Remote Farm enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it. {T}, Remove a depletion counter from Remote Farm: Add {W}{W} to your mana pool. If there are no depletion counters on Remote Farm, sacrifice it.

card.name: Renounce
card.text: Sacrifice any number of permanents. You gain 2 life for each permanent sacrificed this way.

card.name: Revered Elder
card.text: {1}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Revered Elder this turn.

card.name: Reverent Mantra
card.text: You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay Reverent Mantra's mana cost. Choose a color. All creatures gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Revive
card.text: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Righteous Aura
card.text: {W}, Pay 2 life: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Righteous Indignation
card.text: Whenever a creature blocks a black or red creature, the blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Rishadan Airship
card.text: Flying Rishadan Airship can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Rishadan Brigand
card.text: Flying When Rishadan Brigand enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {3}. Rishadan Brigand can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Rishadan Cutpurse
card.text: When Rishadan Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {1}.

card.name: Rishadan Footpad
card.text: When Rishadan Footpad enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {2}.

card.name: Rishadan Pawnshop
card.text: {2}, {T}: Shuffle target nontoken permanent you control into its owner's library.

card.name: Rishadan Port
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Tap target land.

card.name: Robber Fly
card.text: Flying Whenever Robber Fly becomes blocked, defending player discards all the cards in his or her hand, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Rouse
card.text: If you control a Swamp, you may pay 2 life rather than pay Rouse's mana cost. Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Rushwood Elemental
card.text: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rushwood Elemental.

card.name: Rushwood Grove
card.text: Rushwood Grove enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Put a storage counter on Rushwood Grove. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Rushwood Grove: Add {G} to your mana pool for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Rushwood Herbalist
card.text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Rushwood Legate
card.text: If an opponent controls an Island and you control a Forest, you may cast Rushwood Legate without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Saber Ants
card.text: Whenever Saber Ants is dealt damage, you may put that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Sacred Prey
card.text: Whenever Sacred Prey becomes blocked, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sailmonger
card.text: {2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Sand Squid
card.text: Islandwalk You may choose not to untap Sand Squid during your untap step. {T}: Tap target creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Sand Squid remains tapped.

card.name: Sandstone Needle
card.text: Sandstone Needle enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it. {T}, Remove a depletion counter from Sandstone Needle: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool. If there are no depletion counters on Sandstone Needle, sacrifice it.

card.name: Saprazzan Bailiff
card.text: When Saprazzan Bailiff enters the battlefield, exile all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards. When Saprazzan Bailiff leaves the battlefield, return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to their owners' hands.

card.name: Saprazzan Breaker
card.text: {U}: Put the top card of your library into your graveyard. If that card is a land card, Saprazzan Breaker can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Saprazzan Cove
card.text: Saprazzan Cove enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Put a storage counter on Saprazzan Cove. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Saprazzan Cove: Add {U} to your mana pool for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Saprazzan Heir
card.text: Whenever Saprazzan Heir becomes blocked, you may draw three cards.

card.name: Saprazzan Legate

card.name: Saprazzan Outrigger
card.text: When Saprazzan Outrigger attacks or blocks, put it on top of its owner's library at end of combat.

card.name: Saprazzan Raider
card.text: When Saprazzan Raider becomes blocked, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Saprazzan Skerry
card.text: Saprazzan Skerry enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it. {T}, Remove a depletion counter from Saprazzan Skerry: Add {U}{U} to your mana pool. If there are no depletion counters on Saprazzan Skerry, sacrifice it.

card.name: Scandalmonger
card.text: {2}: Target player discards a card. Any player may activate this ability but only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.

card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Shoving Match

card.text: {3}{B}: Destroy target blocking creature at end of combat.

card.name: Skulking Fugitive
card.text: When Skulking Fugitive becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

card.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Sacrifice Skull of Ramos: Add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Snorting Gahr
card.text: Whenever Snorting Gahr becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Snuff Out

card.name: Soothing Balm
card.text: Target player gains 5 life.

card.text: {3}{U}{U}: Shuffle your library. {X}: Look at the top X cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.text: Enchant creature Pay 2 life: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Spidersilk Armor

card.name: Spontaneous Generation
card.text: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each card in your hand.

card.name: Squall
card.text: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.

card.text: {2}: Squallmonger deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Sustenance

card.name: Tectonic Break

card.name: Thermal Glider
card.text: Flying, protection from red

card.name: Thieves' Auction
card.text: Exile all nontoken permanents. Starting with you, each player chooses one of the exiled cards and puts it onto the battlefield tapped under his or her control. Repeat this process until all cards exiled this way have been chosen.

card.name: Thrashing Wumpus

card.text: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay Thunderclap's mana cost. Thunderclap deals 3 damage to target creature.

card.name: Thwart
card.text: You may return three Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay Thwart's mana cost. Counter target spell.

card.name: Trade Routes

card.name: Tranquility
card.text: Destroy all enchantments.

card.text: {T}: Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. Activate this ability only during combat after blockers are declared.

card.name: Tremor
card.text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Two-Headed Dragon
card.text: Flying {1}{R}: Two-Headed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Two-Headed Dragon can't be blocked except by two or more creatures. Two-Headed Dragon can block an additional creature.

card.name: Undertaker
card.text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Unmask
card.text: You may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay Unmask's mana cost. Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Unnatural Hunger
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Unnatural Hunger deals damage to that player equal to that creature's power unless he or she sacrifices another creature.

card.name: Uphill Battle
card.text: Creatures played by your opponents enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Vendetta
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Venomous Breath
card.text: Choose target creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by it this turn.

card.name: Venomous Dragonfly
card.text: Flying Whenever Venomous Dragonfly blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Vernal Equinox
card.text: Any player may cast creature and enchantment cards as though they had flash.

card.name: Vine Trellis
card.text: Defender {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Volcanic Wind
card.text: Volcanic Wind deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield as you cast Volcanic Wind.

card.name: Wall of Distortion
card.text: Defender {2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: War Cadence
card.text: {X}{R}: This turn, creatures can't block unless their controller pays {X} for each blocking creature he or she controls.

card.name: War Tax
card.text: {X}{U}: This turn, creatures can't attack unless their controller pays {X} for each attacking creature he or she controls.

card.name: Warmonger
card.text: {2}: Warmonger deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Warpath
card.text: Warpath deals 3 damage to each blocking creature and each blocked creature.

card.name: Waterfront Bouncer
card.text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wave of Reckoning
card.text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

card.name: Wishmonger
card.text: {2}: Target creature gains protection from the color of its controller's choice until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Word of Blasting
card.text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.

card.name: Worry Beads
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
